extendedInfo.description: New Orleans Television is the Official Visitor Information TV Station of the New Orleans Convention and Visitors Bureau, providing visitors with facts and insider info they need to make the most of their visit to Americaâs most authentic and exciting city. Live 24/7 with award-winning restaurant reviews, up-to-the-minute special event reporting, nightlife and entertainment reviews, the music scene, the sports scene, arts, culture and hot tips on up and coming neighborhoods and trends. NOTV is 100% Good News. No other station offers the hyper-local insights to this city that we doâ¦ all in high definition created by a talented team of producers living on the edge! NOTV is defined by gorgeous visuals, fun and colorful insights with unique home grown Southern personality because it comes from people who live, work and play right here in New Orleans! Witty reporting with a creative twist from fascinating people who love New Orleans and know itâ¦ inside and out! On-demand video coming soon to the NOTV App!For more New Orleans Television, you can watch live and on-demand at www.TripSmarter.com.

reviews.title: Put the French Quarter in your hands
reviews.comment: Great app for planning a trip to the French Quarter and NO in general. New Orleans Television rocks.
reviews.author: R Blalock

reviews.title: NOTV
reviews.comment: Great video. Every time I watch it, I want to visit New Orleans
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Local tv station shows all the best hotspots and restaurants. Good stuff.

reviews.title: I love NOLA!
reviews.comment: If you love New Orleans, you\'ll love NOTV. Very fun and informative to watch. Useful app if you plan to be in New Orleans.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great video app
reviews.comment: I will watch this channel before a trip to New Orleans. Plenty to do and see.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This app is a must download for anyone who loves the Big Easy! Seriously. Download it. Now. You can thank me later.

reviews.title: Im from new orleans uptown 3rd ward
reviews.comment: This is a great app for people who wanna visit a city with alot passion many things to do abd great people you can meet

reviews.comment: Loved the Key West app downloaded the New Orleans one and it is just as great.
